Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Too crowdy for 3 persons although we had suite with one bedroom Bad smell from bathroom no iron and ironing desk even no one free coffee capsule furniture in the kitchen devastated small bedroom with bad from wall to wall Too expensive for payed money
Positive_Review: Location and design

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The room are much smaller than what is shown in the photos I frequently go to Paris and this was my worst hotel experience I booked an ensuit with a baby The travel cot had no mattresss I asked them if I could atleast have a blanket so I can use it as mattress they gave me a king size Duvets and said this is all we have They only had sparkling water in the Fridge i asked for still Walter they said they don t have any Imagine a hotel with no still water I had to walk at night to a local shop which is not very close to by water for my baby If you have kids baby don t even try booking this hotel The manager who was chewing gum when we were talking to him which was very unprofessional

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Air con kept automatically turning on at set times despite us turning it off
Positive_Review: Small compact rooms however clean and practical and we had limited noise pollution despite it being in a popular street scene area with high traffic

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: So bad bad bad I have complaine about the hotel First of all I waited one hour to get the room They made me pay for the rooms extra than the original price I mean you get from me 304 euro by booing com for two rooms and they are already cut from my account but when I arrived they took from me the money because they said That they didn t got the money from Booking com So why I payed twis also I showed them the massage from my phone they didn t believe me So sad so sad Please solve my problem plz
Positive_Review: Nothing at all everything was bad bad bad

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The staff while friendly seemed overwhelmed The WiFi access never worked properly and I saw several other guests seeking help with this as well While the room was lovely the lighting was not effective can t read in bed without getting up to turn off the lights bathroom lighting was not good
Positive_Review: The room was comfortable and quiet

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: 1 The rooms are small They are fine for 2 people but 4 people is difficult especially when the sofa bed is out there is no room There is not much wardrobe space either The bedroom is the bed with 1 ft space all around 2 Coffee The property says it is 4 start but they make you pay for coffee pods Even 3 star properties by the airport don t do that It is a pet peeve because I like my coffee in the morning Also why put code pods for Nespresso in the fridge The Coffie comes out like warm from the machine Beyond comprehension 3 Towels They don t seem to get it that 4 people are in the room Everyday they take away 4 dirty towels and put back 2 clean ones and everyday I have to go to the reception and ask for towels 4 Lighting The rooms are very dark lacking lighting at night Luckily the windows are big so in the day you can see 5 Smoking The website says non smoking property and every night we come back the corridor filled with smoke from other rooms Some of which gets into our room 6 Wifi The Internet is fast but if you have business to do that uses services other than email and websites then you will have to use a VPN connection to get out They restrict the services allowed Annoying but with VPN I was able to do what I needed
Positive_Review: the staff were extremely helpful and friendly If the property lived up to the level of the staff I would have given it 5 stars

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Stuff are not helpful as I have checked out from hotel and forget my language in storage room I called hotel to ship it to London and lady answered sorry we are not responsible even when I gave my friend to pick up the language they didn t answer
Positive_Review: Location is good behind Champs Elys es

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The room is a little crowded for four people
Positive_Review: I travel with my husband and three college age daughters My daughters and I stayed in a room for with a queen bed up in a loft and a pull out sofa bed Very cute design The beds were comfortable but it was a little crowded My husband had a single room on the same floor The staff is wonderful and very accommodating Located just a 5 to 10 minute walk from the Champs Elyesse

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Super nice and friendly staff excellent service The hotel was really close to the Eiffel Tower and grand palace and there were restaurants nearby too

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The walls could be more noise proof
Positive_Review: Modern luxurious and very well kept property Well equipped mini bar ask for price list Free tea and coffee Very comfy bed quiet backyard room Great location

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: I did not get the room I booked and paid for We were in a very small room on the ground floor with a rotten place in the wood floor right in the area at the foot of the bed We were put in a room with a garden view after paying extra for a city view We were moved the next day up to the 6th floor with city view that I paid for The guy then told me I hope you are happy now There was a terrible odor coming from the bathroom so bad that we had to open the window and keep that door closed The sink was stopped up in the bathroom and the shower control fixture was broken The fixture was busted and easy to see that you could not turn on the cold side and the button was missing from the hot side I told two different employees about this and they acted like it was just fine The mini bar fridge had a small container of milk that had expired in Feb and this is mid May My goodness Oh yeah the Hotel staff blamed the booking problems on Booking Com
Positive_Review: The property is in a good location IF you want to stay in the prime high priced area

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Staff made me pay for things that were already broken when we arrived said coffee was free but charged for it after Do not accept genius perks
Positive_Review: Good location clean hotel

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: If we put the extra bed its hard to pass trough to and from the main room
Positive_Review: Its a hotel My room got cleaned up everyday very neat and clean We all got one password for once device for wifi the receptionists were helpful I love the area too big stores in champs elysees are walking distance

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Not a single thing
Positive_Review: Everything was perfect location was first class with lots of shops and restaurants close by So close to the sites Staff were polite and friendly

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The junior suite had a double bed but no seats to sit on Two cheap metal stools by the 1 metre by about 800 mm fitted table It did not match in any way the images on their website There was only one staff member to check us in and he was answering phone calls at the same time We had to wait about 20 minutes before we could be checked in The one bedroom apartment had a sofa bed in the eating area but the double bed was in a room so narrow that the walls were touching either side of the bed It could only be accessed by climbing in from the bottom end of the bed
Positive_Review: The location close to the Arc de Triumph

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The hotel is on a very busy road and the double glazing is not really sufficient for the noise I gather the hotel must be aware of this as there were disposable earplugs amongst the toiletries
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Bed is very comfortable even the room is quite small Fully equipped room with everything you may need Staff on the day shift was very attentive and helfpful but not for the night shift

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The room was so small the bed was wall to wall climbing down the bed to get out An elderly person wouldn t manage it The living area was cramped We had a junior suite and if you put up the sofabed you wouldn t be able to move The staff said we had an upgrade we had asked to for a balcony on our booking but they said we couldn t have one The bathroom towels were like a runner on a table the toilet seat was broken The whole experience was disappointing and the pictures of the room on the website were so misleading
Positive_Review: Location

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The bathroom had a very bad smell The early check in policy is ridiculous you have to pay 90 euros so they can try to give you the room by 1 30 p m They tried to charge my credit card during my stay without asking first that s not acceptable
Positive_Review: The location was good The room was clean

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Tiny facility Bed surrounded by walls Tiny shower Bad smell in bathroom Not clean we found a broken glass and dirty kleenex behind the bed
Positive_Review: Nothing

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The room smelled a little but this was solved by opening the large windows to balcony in the living room I would suggest ventilating the room before new guests check in Bedroom in one bedroom suite is small no bedside tables No phones in rooms
Positive_Review: Comfortable room well designed in a great location Room has all the amenities aside from phone Good wifi Good shower pressure and temperature Nice to have the small balcony Staff was friendly and polite I had a look at the 2 bedroom suite which would be great for a bigger group

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: No hangers for clothes outside a very small cupboard not enough space to put the luggage in the small room room was not ready at planned arrival time
Positive_Review: In the middle of the center friendly stuff nice decoration

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: This is a preference my girlfriend disagrees with the location is central to Champs Elysees and the Eiffel Tower certainly a convenience but the high location score made me believe the immediate neighborhood would have more charm However the immediate area was not very busy and the street quiet at least during our weekend stay which was nice especially considering the crowded sights so close by
Positive_Review: The staff was very friendly helpful Yasmine and Hamza were especially accommodating and made the stay a great experience We were first greeted in English which was not expected but proved to simplify the process

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Unbelievably small room Unable to get out of bed from the side and suitcase has to be in the bathroom Booked for 5 adults and one was on a Fold out that completely bocked the bedroom door When I booked a airport transfer it wasn t there to meet us After much expensive phone calls and an hour later we got a cab Very cold waitiing
Positive_Review: Clean and great location

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The size of appartement was ok but the arrangement of the bed and salon making the room very small With very narrow passage The only elevator for 6 floor is very very small The passage between the elevator and the rooms difficult to pass by No fitness center
Positive_Review: The location and the view of tha appartement in the charming road of paris Nice wifi connection

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Apartment suitable for 2 couples but not for more people Sofa bed in very tiny lounge room kitchen There was no dining room table so we couldn t eat in the apartment
Positive_Review: Very good location friendly and helpful staff

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The bedrooms are small very small The bed is in between two walls and no space in between If you want location it is the best
Positive_Review: Staff were very friendly especially a young lad called Hamza who took his time to ensure we were satisfied with the overall accommodation He was also kind enough to point out a few things to do in the city

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The apartments are super duper small We are a family with four little children and we arrived there with three big luggage baby stroller There was literally no room to move in the apartment I had to move furnitures around all the time in order to open the extra bed open luggage etc This was really very uncomfortable Maybe I should have chosen a different hotel
Positive_Review: Very good hotel very clean great staff The location is amazing Despite the cons this hotel is great

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Did not change the bedsheets daily
Positive_Review: The staff are kind and helpful provided us information and things as we requested The room are good Location is good enough Just 5 mins walk from Champs Elysees Easy to grab a cab and Avenue Marceau traffic are smooth

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The room was tiny and very dark with poor lighting The shower was tiny I am short and I am normal weight and I kept bumping myself against the shower door which did not stay well closed The shower was a tiny box The radiator in the bathroom got so hot you could burn yourself on it There was no space to put anything in the bathroom The bed was a single bed but I guess that is standard for Europe when booking a single room
Positive_Review: I got a deal on a single room which was a great price for Paris The location was great and it was very quiet 5 minute walk to George V metro stop I am not a fan of the Champs neighbourhood I prefer le Marais and St Germain de Pres and would rather stay there next time as I did not go to Paris to see fancy stores Regardless if you want to go the C E area for most of your stay it is very well situated The room was clean People at the front desk were very helpful and nice

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Very nice staff I was traveling with my family two children 2 5 and Olivia from reception staff made a very nice check in We loved the design touch in the hotel decoration the bed is good Globally is a very nice hotel for family traveling with a great balance between price and quality The breakfast offer can be improved The ideia of having someone delivering at your suite a basket with bread croissant and chocolate bread is very good but something is missing maybe including fresh fruit but this did not affect our experience Suggestion to the staff continue to make an effort in hotel maintenance and people will love it

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Rooms are very small We stayed at 2 bedroom apartment type There was no bedroom in one of rooms only the bed in a box type walls You feel like you sleep in a box We stayed 7 days and They did not change the sheets at all not a once Hotel workers are not helping to carry your luggages Only the lady called Olivia helped to bring our luggages to the room at the check in But at the check out olivia was not there thanks to her she is very helpfull they only watched how we struggle with the luggages Also the day before we checked out I asked a man at the front desk can t remember his name to book a taxi and ask the total price to go consulate first and then airport he asked and tell us that taxi driver said it s 80 euros he spoke in french so I could not understand we accepted Next morning taxi driver came and asked that if we are going to airport we said no he didnt tell you we have to go consulate first ok we went airport finally and he charged us 140 euros and he said 80 is the only airport fee So I don t know who is the liar but my advice is do not book a taxi from hotel
Positive_Review: Location is very good 5 10 minutes walk from Champs Elysees Price is good for the location

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: A little bit small for a family but you should expect that for a prime location in Paris
Positive_Review: Very good location clean and modern apartment Very helpful staff in the front desk Christian provide great information about the city and help to arrange transportation

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Very small room apartment which is common in Paris We only needed a clean safe place to sleep and this hotel was a little delight
Positive_Review: Lovely staff who spoke good English for us and went out of their way to answer all our questions and make us feel welcome Very clean room and bathroom Elegant little hotel in excellent location in central Paris

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Given us the ground floor not private noisy at night due to amount of guests with late check in
Positive_Review: Location amenities in the room wide range of items in the mini fridge

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es

Positive_Review: The staff was very friendly and gave great recommendations on local amenities Our room was trendy quite functional and clean

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es

Positive_Review: It was amazing the staff is super helpful and friendly Specially Sonya Raul Both went out their way to help me and gave me full attention at all times excellent english and manners

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Size of the biggest appartment wasn t liveable for 5 persons Kitchen equipment dated and missing basic stuff
Positive_Review: Location staff quality of the bed

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: So small and suffocating old and tired furniture gym not existent but in the brochure Been called numerous time to give hotel higher scores
Positive_Review: Location

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The space is really crammed It is Paris after all and we are happy to give up space for location Having said that we stayed in a 2 bedroom apartment as a family of 5 with lots of bags We were always out and only came back to sleep Beds are comfortable and a sleeper couch in the lounge
Positive_Review: Location is perfect a walk away from everything Eiffel Tower Champs Elysees Very convenient Classy and modern interiors

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Hotel MGMT they are missing to understand what is the client need I booked the hotel because of the location and the air condition Hotel MGMT they restrict all controls panel and make the controlling with their hand SO if the person has the controlling have a cold will make all rooms hot After four times I complained to the reception they let me have the control from my room
Positive_Review: Great Hotel and Excellent Customer Service Thank You Mrs Mariya We were very happy with your treatment

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Dear All My name is Pamela I live in Malta I come very regularly to Paris This was my first time at Helzear Suites I stayed 3nights I must say the note giving on booking is way to low compare the space comfort location and service I go every time to hotels when I stay in Paris 97 of hotels in Paris unless you go to 5stars you have the elevator close to the rooms and very small rooms Here you have a door that separate before going to your suites You have all comfort at Helzear If you don t feel like eating out you can cook because a kitchen with a good size fridge available and well equipped Everything Very clean you can order breakfast if you don t feel like going out the night before I personally like it The location is just Top You have on of the best market where you can buy almost everything Pharmacy close by a French bakery Josephine 2min from there that is really good a supermarket 5min Champs lys es 8min walk and very important you are not in a noisy place The staff was really amazing very helpful a special thank you to Maria at the reception I would compare Helzear suites with a proper Parisian boutique hotel because you just feel home If you want to feel how it is to live in Paris it s the place to be without you taking care of anything The staff is there when you need but not overdoing it I can only recommend I m definitely coming back Keep it up Helzear Suites I gave a note of 10 10 because nothing negative to say Pamela M

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: This is really an observation rather than anything else the living space was on the small side so it s not really an apartment to hang out which is perfectly fine when you are using it as a base you should be out enjoying Paris after all Think of it more of a multi bedroom hotel suite than an apartment With the sofa bed in use the living room just disappears For us this was OK at that point we were just there to sleep We would definitely come back on a future trip to Paris
Positive_Review: Fantastic location 5 mins walk from the Arc de Triomphe and 15 20 mins walk from the Eiffel Tower Good restaurants nearby check the different review sites to avoid the touristy ones Staff were very helpful to arrange airport transfers both ways and luggage storage during the day after checkout Beds are really comfortable and the apartment was clean and modern

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: There wasn t any shampoo and shower gel given in the room and I went down to ask one of the staff said is in room and I said no and eventually he gave me a shampoo and a swop I just want to say I don t think a little shampoos and gel is not worth to much And also cleaner clean the room second day and still didn t give anything Overall the price and quality doesn t match
Positive_Review: Location is perfect

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: We booked a two bedroom apartment for 2 adults and four children but it was tiny When the sofa bed was pulled out it blocked the doorway to the bedroom It was a tight squeeze but did the job for 2 nights
Positive_Review: The location was excellent and we all slept really soundly

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The hotel was in a great location just few minutes walking away from the Champs Elysee metro station and RER The suite was fully equipped with kitchenette which made our life easier for making a quick meal and there are few supermarkets near the hotel for buying your stuff The staff were very helpful and friendly We would highly recommend it as for sure will be staying there again if we intended to travel to Paris

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: My room was very small and there is a pillar in the middle of the room which make it smaller Also everything in the room is chargeable coffee supposed to be free of charge

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: I Did not like that we need to pay for a codfee on the room All hotels expensive or inexpensive has coffee free in a litle package free in your hotel you need to pay for it I think you can have a little instantaneous coffee package with creme like Orher hotels same category Also I did not like that it was not soups body wash shampoo any thing on the bathroom when we travel we did mot bring with us those thinks because the airport do not allowed to bring liquid all hotel offer that
Positive_Review: The staff the people ar the lobby excellent A

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The rooms are really small We get some problems with cleaning woman after cleaning each day sth from small things provided by hotel was missing soap sponge for dishes shampoo so we needed to go down to reception and ask this things again also with our towels sth strange happend only some of our 3 towels were changed so after we could not understand whose towels are still there For sure this all minor issues but it is really annoying
Positive_Review: Location is just great 15 min on foot from Eiffel Tower metro is close with direct connection to city center Rooms and bathroom very clean People on reception very friendly and ready to help with any question all EN speaking We had quiet side so good sleep

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Excellent location 5 mins walk to my fav stores even with strollers all staff were GREAT just helpful kind and very sweet Will totally stay here again especially if with kids THANK you

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Bed was too small chairs in sitting area extremely uncomfortable The cost is obviously related to the location Nothing special about the room Costly even had to pay for a small bottle of water in the room
Positive_Review: location excellent Staff very friendly and helpful Appreciated the excellent English spoken Very clean and close to many restaurants so no need to have meals available in hotel

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Small room and apartments but this is not a big problem you are in Paris and most of the hotels like that The adapter should be free of charge once I return it to the reception before check out Mini bar drinks is little expensive 3 5 for each drink
Positive_Review: Location is perfect Staff very friendly specialy Mr hamza many thanks to him Easy chick in and check out

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: They didn t offer free water bottles Uber driver did or creamers for coffee The shower in one of the rooms had a door that didn t work well Very small shower The beds were not comfortable and the towels were very thin
Positive_Review: The d cor was nice The location was good

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The counter top in the kitchenette was scarred with cut marks and a few of the pots were dirty when we checked in Also one of the housekeepers still knocked on the door even though we had the do not disturb sign on the door
Positive_Review: Bed was nice Service at desk Laura and manager were good Afternoon housekeeper was awesome Zhou Loved the decor especially in lobby and stairwell Nice balance of elegance and whimsy Location is down the street from arc d triomphe and five minutes from champs lys e and not far from the Eiffel Tower about 20 mins walk The hotel also took a nice and balanced approach to security Also there s a little supermarket around the corner and great boulangeries and p tisseries

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: it s great experience living here the staff in the hotel are very nice and helpful especially the Chinese girl who gives a lot of useful information i love this hotel and surely i will choose this hotel next time in Paris

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Comfortable quit clean useful nice location and very friendly staff knowing that I stayed in a two bed rooms apartment with my wife kids and they were satisfied The only thing that I didn t like is the variety of mine bar and hotel doesn t have a restaurant

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: A bit small for a family of 5 but that was not really a problem since we did not spent much time in the apartment

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The Hotel was very clean and the team of reception is professionnel I want to thank Mr KAMIRAN from the reception he was very helpfull Wonderfull Hotel

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Old Space was poor especially with pull out bed open Shower is way to small unless you weigh less then 120lbs Almost got a splinter in my foot from the wood floors that should have been redone 50 years ago Microwave barely worked Was not comfortable for the amount I paid to stay there Then the front desk person when we were leaving was upset I wouldn t fill out a long survey in front of him while the taxi was waiting Then had to charge a minimal 22 Euro city tax on top of the large amount I already paid and wanted us to wait 6 minutes while the charge went through During all this the taxi is running a meter and we were charged 14 Euros higher then what was quoted I barely had enough Euro s left to cover it Bad ending to what was already a mediocre stay
Positive_Review: Very close to everything Great location Front desk staff was mostly pleasant and spoke English ok

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es

Positive_Review: Its like you re home Really good location nice fancies and equipment staff very friendly thanks to Shanon for giving us some good advices I will definitely come back

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es

Positive_Review: Good location and environment Very convenient small market and so many restaurants and staff are all very nice and friendly

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es

Positive_Review: Great hotel right in the center of Paris Liked the location and hotel itself Rooms are clean and nice Everything is in 5 10 minutes reach by walking

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Few plates were dirty dried food crust on the plates when we checked in and we had to wash them ourselves and we ended up washing the all of them cos then we could not trust the ones which looked clean The bathroom water outlet was probably choked and it filled with water pretty fast and soon you are showering in pool of water The lift is very small cannot carry suitcase and a baby stroller at the same time but that is probably true of most hotels in Paris They could have provided a bit more utensils in the kitchenette
Positive_Review: The location was reasonably good Eiffel tower is about 1 5 km walk uphill a bit on the way back but nothing really bad There was a nice balcony to sit in the evening The suite is just right size for a couple with a kid or two baby cot was provided we requested before arrival Small basic kitchenette for cooking

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Our apartment was at the front on the third floor and the traffic noise was very obvious even throughout the night I managed to sleep fine but my partner found it difficult to sleep with the noise
Positive_Review: Clean smart modern apartment with a good amount of space Towels were provided there s a proper hairdryer in the bathroom and the small kitchen space was useful

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: They should skip the fully in the description of fully equipped kitchen It s very basic only to heat something up The bathroom sink had a very nasty penetrating smell
Positive_Review: Location is great good bed decent internet connection

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The shower leaked all over the bathroom
Positive_Review: There was an incredible amount of space for what I paid for two nights both in the bedroom living room and bathroom The bed and pillows were comfortable and the location was great The staff was awesome super helpful and kind

Negative_Review: WiFi needs improvement storage not much but with a few adjustments could be rectified bowls please for cereal maybe free coffee in the room would be nice

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: A nice accommodation with well equipped rooms It has everything a traveler you need to be comfortable to spend the night Rooms are not large but cozy Very good location close to the Arc de Triomphe the Champs Elysees and the Eiffel Tower is a 15 20 minute walk away Close to the metro and RER which connects to the airport A few meters back to the side of the Arc de Triomphe an excellent cafeteria with fresh and delicious Bagels super good breakfast

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: When the sofa bed is out there isn t much space to move and one of the bedrooms is quite tight We were happy to live out of our cases but others might not be and there s not a lot of cupboard wardrobe space The road noise at night is quite intrusive but we took and were offered ear plugs
Positive_Review: The staff were exceptionally polite and helpful The bathrooms were finished to a high standard and the whole apartment was clean and well maintained The location is great for access to attractions on the west side Arc de Triomphe Champs Elysees Eiffel Tower and close to metro and bus for others

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Very small uncomfortable room with 3 tiny areas and 2 pathrooms and one kitchen in a very small area so no room for the bed which looks like you are sleeping in storage room
Positive_Review: Great location and friendly staff

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: I would change the floor wood in the room cus it s pretty old and noisy when you step on it especially in the night
Positive_Review: Pretty nice double room apartments really enough space for 4 Location good as well 16me is 16me Smiling staff

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: It was not as spacious as in the pictures
Positive_Review: The staff were incredibly friendly and helpful with good knowledge about restaurants around the hotel Great location very close to main attractions Great interior clean and comfortable

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Hidden charges city tax added at end of stay was unexpected cost Being charged for use of coffee and milk was minor irritation
Positive_Review: Well designed compact and bijou space represented good value for money

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Kitchen could be more well equipped to allow basic cooking needs beyond reheating take out meals
Positive_Review: Great location within walking distance to Arc de Triomphe Champs Elysees and metro stations Charles de Gaulle Etoile or Alma Marceau Many choices of restaurants or take out a grocery shop and bakeries just around the corner

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: This has to be one of the best value for money locations in Paris great location great rooms and friendly staff They ll even bring you breakfast for 5 so I can t see why you would rather stay in a hotel Looking forward to returning in a couple of weeks

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Little things such as no soap bars in the shower difficulty to close the curtains on the windows lack of a proper arrangement to dy the kitchenware
Positive_Review: We have liked the size of our studio its layout which in addition to 2 bedrooms included a den good heating system We have liked the equiped kitchen and obviously we have liked the location Helpfull staff

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: We had to wait for 30 minutes until the room is ready although we informed our arrival time in advance which is 4pm The receptionist was not friendly at that time
Positive_Review: Good location Also the room was very well equipped

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The room was superb but we found it a little small
Positive_Review: When we checked in the first room they gave us was on the ground floor right on the street the room was nice enough but we asked for another room on an upper floor which was perfect this was arranged with out any fuss what so ever the staff were very nice about it indeed

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The check in is at 3 o clock i did not like that it should be earlier like 12 or 1 clock
Positive_Review: The staff very helpful and friendly The location is supereb

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Beds a harder than I m used to v memory foam but being very picky
Positive_Review: Modern style clean everything you need and convenient short walk to major sights in Paris

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: room way too small could not even open the window as the bed blocked the access to window Shower at the bathroom too small
Positive_Review: excellent price good location

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We had a little studio with a full bed and bed sofa The bed sofa was very comfortable and even two adults could sleep there well The room was newly renovated well equipped and quite spacious for such a location in Paris The place is in a business area where it is quiet in the evenings and weekends but champs elysees is just 5 min away so you have all types of restaurants and shops you need Take the breakfast service if you want some croissants during the weekend or need to leave early The nearby bakery was closed weekends and the little supermarkets only opened at 8 30

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Baby cot wasnt ready when we arrived and when staff brought it it had puke inside Some parts of the room werent clean As we went looking for one of the kids toys under the beds the sofa behind the curtains we kept being surprised
Positive_Review: Looks really cool Good location

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Accomodation is very well situated On walking distance of the Champs Elysees Arc de Triomphe and Eifeltower Also on 5 minute walk of Hop on Hop off bus stop

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: but it was extremely small to open the wardrobe door you had to move the bed Not for you if you don t like the feeling of being cramped in
Positive_Review: We had the studio apartment which had mostly everything we needed comfy bed good shower wifi kitchenette

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: One of the advantages of a non serviced apartment should be that you are NOT disturbed by room service But we had the unpleasant experience of first being asked two times within 10 minutes if we needed service and then after one knock on the door a staff member had planned to show our clearly occupied and private space to a group of about 10 unknown visitors and here you can see one of our studios After we accepted his apologies later he again knocked on our door even with the DND sign on It felt unsafe that unknown visitors were clearly allowed to visit our private space for commercial purposes
Positive_Review: The welcome upon arrival is warm and very friendly and the location and facilities are excellent Everything was nicely prepared and some special requests were taken into account perfectly

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Poor cleaning of room before check in found old socks with heavy odor and litter in closet Poor lighting in the bathroom even after we asked for change of bulb Very small bedrooms
Positive_Review: Nice location friendly staff

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Room on the ground floor too noisy Had to keep curtains closed at all times so that passers by can t see what s going on inside
Positive_Review: Good location large room and bathroom

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: I was asked to change the room on the second day for no clear reason The room given to me the next morning was literally at the entrance of the hotel less than two meters from the main entrance Was noisy during the day No phone in the room so you can never be in touch with reception room service anyone else No restaurant in the hotel no in room dining expect that you can get croissant delivered to your room in the morning
Positive_Review: Good location

Hotel_Name: Suites H tel Helzear Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: No washing machine and coffee in room is charged
Positive_Review: Good services and had helped to send back my coat to Shanghai which was left behind after check out Very nice staff
